title: Tesco Grocery & Clubcard
description: Get more power in your pocket with the new Tesco Grocery and Clubcard app. It makes online and in-store supermarket shopping quicker and more convenient than ever. Shop from up to 50,000 products, including all the brands you love. Choose home delivery, Click+Collect or our new 60 minute delivery service, Whoosh*, and get your supermarket grocery shopping when, where and how you want. New to the app, everything you love about Tesco Clubcard ready to use in one scan of your Clubcard barcode when you shop in your local supermarket or express store. Save more with exclusive Clubcard Prices. Collect Clubcard points when you shop for groceries online and in store. Turn your points into Clubcard vouchers and spend them straight from your app. Spend your vouchers on your groceries or get 3x their value to use with our Reward Partners, including everything from days out to a Disney+ subscription. Join Clubcard Christmas Savers and budget for your best festive celebration yet. Plus, use your Clubcard to unlock exclusive subscriptions including Clubcard Plus and Delivery Saver and get even better value. What's more, we've added tools to help you shop smarter. Check your local store has what you need before you visit with Stock Check. Make a list right in your app and use it while you shop in store**. And add your favourites straight to your online basket. Shop online anytime, anywhere. Do your online grocery shopping on the train home, in front of the TV or wherever it suits you best. Never miss a deal. With Clubcard in your app, all deals and Clubcard Prices are right there on your homescreen. So you'll always see the best offers on products you love. Do more of what you love for less. Get 3x your Clubcard voucher value to spend with Reward Partners on fun days out with the family, dinner with friends, gym membership and much more. Get your shopping how, when and where you want it. Choose from Home Delivery, Click+Collect and Whoosh* 60 minute delivery and get your shopping in the way that suits you best. Change your order when it suits you. Forgotten something? You can add or remove items from your order and choose a different delivery slot up until 11.45pm the evening before it’s due. Get handy order updates. We’ll send you reminders when your order is due, how long you have to make changes and more. Just opt-in to push notifications Check we've got what you need before you visit. Baking a cake and run out of eggs? With Stock Check, you can now check if the products you need are available in your local store. Make a list with live stock info. You can make a shopping lists that includes live stock information from your local store. And when you’re in store, your list is always at your fingertips. Build your basket straight from your favourites. We save your favourites, usual purchases and previous orders to make shopping even quicker. Enjoy easier online shopping. We’re here to help all of our customers. Our app is fully accessible with VoiceOver functionality and support for larger font sizes. Sign in quickly and securely. Add fingerprint or face recognition to make signing in even quicker. And two factor authentication via SMS adds extra account protection. Help us get better. We're always making updates and improvements based on your feedback. *Whoosh available in selected areas and from specific Tesco Express stores only **In Store Lists feature available to all customers from Sept 2021
descriptionHTML:
Get more power in your pocket with the new Tesco Grocery and Clubcard app. It makes online and in-store supermarket shopping quicker and more convenient than ever. Shop from up to 50,000 products, including all the brands you love. Choose home delivery, Click+Collect or our new 60 minute delivery service, Whoosh*, and get your supermarket grocery shopping when, where and how you want.

New to the app, everything you love about Tesco Clubcard ready to use in one scan of your Clubcard barcode when you shop in your local supermarket or express store. Save more with exclusive Clubcard Prices. Collect Clubcard points when you shop for groceries online and in store. Turn your points into Clubcard vouchers and spend them straight from your app. Spend your vouchers on your groceries or get 3x their value to use with our Reward Partners, including everything from days out to a Disney+ subscription. Join Clubcard Christmas Savers and budget for your best festive celebration yet. Plus, use your Clubcard to unlock exclusive subscriptions including Clubcard Plus and Delivery Saver and get even better value.

What's more, we've added tools to help you shop smarter. Check your local store has what you need before you visit with Stock Check. Make a list right in your app and use it while you shop in store**. And add your favourites straight to your online basket.

Shop online anytime, anywhere.
Do your online grocery shopping on the train home, in front of the TV or wherever it suits you best.

Never miss a deal.
With Clubcard in your app, all deals and Clubcard Prices are right there on your homescreen. So you'll always see the best offers on products you love.

Do more of what you love for less.
Get 3x your Clubcard voucher value to spend with Reward Partners on fun days out with the family, dinner with friends, gym membership and much more.

Get your shopping how, when and where you want it.
Choose from Home Delivery, Click+Collect and Whoosh* 60 minute delivery and get your shopping in the way that suits you best.

Change your order when it suits you.
Forgotten something? You can add or remove items from your order and choose a different delivery slot up until 11.45pm the evening before it’s due.

Get handy order updates.
We’ll send you reminders when your order is due, how long you have to make changes and more. Just opt-in to push notifications

Check we've got what you need before you visit.
Baking a cake and run out of eggs? With Stock Check, you can now check if the products you need are available in your local store.

Make a list with live stock info.
You can make a shopping lists that includes live stock information from your local store. And when you’re in store, your list is always at your fingertips.

Build your basket straight from your favourites.
We save your favourites, usual purchases and previous orders to make shopping even quicker.

Enjoy easier online shopping.
We’re here to help all of our customers. Our app is fully accessible with VoiceOver functionality and support for larger font sizes.

Sign in quickly and securely.
Add fingerprint or face recognition to make signing in even quicker. And two factor authentication via SMS adds extra account protection.

Help us get better.
We're always making updates and improvements based on your feedback.

*Whoosh available in selected areas and from specific Tesco Express stores only

**In Store Lists feature available to all customers from Sept 2021
summary: Order your groceries on the go
summaryHTML: Order your groceries on the go

title: Morrisons Groceries
description: Food, drink and more to your door… Now you can use your laptop, mobile and tablet device to shop online with Morrisons. Take a look at the handy features below to see how we’re making it easier than ever to shop online, wherever you are. Please note that two versions of the app are available to cover our different delivery zones in the UK. To make things easy, we’ll automatically direct you to the right one for your area during the download process. Online Shopping Made Easy • Log in with your Facebook account (that’s one less password to remember) • Instant Shop - we’ll automatically create a typical order for you, based on your recent deliveries • Search for your whole shopping list at once - our handy jotter tool is a notepad and search engine rolled into one. • Stay sync’d with your Morrisons.com account - start an order on your computer and complete it on the app (or vice versa) • Alexa voice shopping lets you add items to an existing order using your Amazon Alexa enabled device Reasons to shop with Morrisons.com Convenience - Choose from handy one hour delivery slots 7 days a week and try food shopping online using a laptop, mobile or tablet. Quality - We’ll deliver British farmed foods to your doorstep. Choose hundreds of fresh products, all with the same quality and best before dates as our stores. Value - Shop weekly special offers and browse thousands of Price Crunch offers, as well as low Morrisons prices on everyday essentials.
descriptionHTML:
Food, drink and more to your door…

Now you can use your laptop, mobile and tablet device to shop online with Morrisons. Take a look at the handy features below to see how we’re making it easier than ever to shop online, wherever you are.

Please note that two versions of the app are available to cover our different delivery zones in the UK. To make things easy, we’ll automatically direct you to the right one for your area during the download process.

Online Shopping Made Easy

• Log in with your Facebook account (that’s one less password to remember)
• Instant Shop - we’ll automatically create a typical order for you, based on your recent deliveries
• Search for your whole shopping list at once - our handy jotter tool is a notepad and search engine rolled into one.
• Stay sync’d with your Morrisons.com account - start an order on your computer and complete it on the app (or vice versa)
• Alexa voice shopping lets you add items to an existing order using your Amazon Alexa enabled device


Reasons to shop with Morrisons.com


Convenience -

Choose from handy one hour delivery slots 7 days a week and try food shopping online using a laptop, mobile or tablet.

Quality -

We’ll deliver British farmed foods to your doorstep. Choose hundreds of fresh products, all with the same quality and best before dates as our stores.

Value -

Shop weekly special offers and browse thousands of Price Crunch offers, as well as low Morrisons prices on everyday essentials.
summary: Morrisons.com - from market street to your street
summaryHTML: Morrisons.com - from market street to your street
recentChanges: We've made a few under-the-hood improvements for performance and security, and we've squashed a few bugs too.
recentChangesHTML: We've made a few under-the-hood improvements for performance and security, and we've squashed a few bugs too.

title: M&S - Fashion, Food & Homeware
description:
Make shopping for your favourite M&S products easier than ever, whether you’re at home, on the go or in store, with the free M&S app. Access your Sparks account, our incredible rewards scheme, as well as exclusive offers and rewards, your digital Sparks card, Scan & Shop plus lots more. 
 
From fashion to gift ideas, shop with ease across our bestselling categories including M&S womenswear, menswear, hampers, kidswear and school uniform, homeware, furniture, beauty and skincare, sportswear, flowers, cakes, food and wine, or shop our seasonal sales. 
 
WHY M&S? 
Effortless online shopping 
Free delivery when you spend over £50 / €50 on clothing, homeware or beauty 
Free nominated-day delivery on all flowers* 
Free Click & Collect in a store of your choice 
Order tracking on all purchases 
Easy, paperless online returns 
Digital receipts when you shop in store* 
Register with Sparks for exclusive offers and rewards, just for you 
Skip the tills in store with Scan & Shop*
 
SCAN & SHOP 
Want to check out faster? Skip the tills with Scan & Shop in our M&S food stores. Scan and pay for your food shopping directly in the app, up to a total value of £45. Use our free Wi-Fi in store or mobile data.
 
YOUR SPARKS CARD 
Sign up to our reward scheme Sparks for exclusive offers based on the things you love, the chance to win your shopping for free every week, plus a charity donation every time you shop. 
Access your rewards and offers in the M&S app any time 
Scan your digital Sparks card and we’ll donate to your favourite charity 
Link your physical Sparks card to the app easily* 
Go digital and get receipts sent straight to your email when shopping in store 
Get app-exclusive Sparks offers to use on food shopping, snacks and hot drinks in store 
 
ENHANCED IN-STORE EXPERIENCE 
Shopping in store and can’t find your size? Use the product scanner* in our app to order your perfect fit, and we’ll deliver it to your home or your nearest M&S store. 
 
GET INSPIRED 
Get the latest advice, trends and tips on fashion, food, skincare, entertaining and more thanks to our inspiring Style & Living articles and features. 
 
HOME ENERGY SAVINGS*
Get a £30 e-gift card when you switch your energy supplier to M&S Energy. Greener energy using 100% renewable electricity and great-value tariffs. Get a quote in seconds and see how much you could save.  
 
FIND US 
Looking for your nearest M&S store? Use the store finder to get directions using GPS maps and you’ll be with us in no time. 
 
What are you waiting for? Download the free M&S app now and get ready to shop. 
 
FOLLOW US 
Follow M&S on social media for the latest news, offers and sale updates: 
Facebook: @marksandspencer 
Instagram: @marksandspencer 
Twitter: @marksandspencer 
Pinterest: @marksandspencer 
TikTok: @mandsfood 
 
Visit us at www.marksandspencer.com
 
*Terms, conditions and some exclusions may apply. See www.marksandspencer.com for more information.

title: ASDA
description:
ASDA’s FREE± grocery shopping app lets you shop for groceries on the go. Get all the amazing in-store offers & easily book a delivery or use our Click & Collect service.
 
Grocery shopping made easy   
Shop your way: Available on all devices on the move. 
Scan items at home: Running out of something? Build your shopping list quickly and easily.  
Create shopping lists: Organise your shop to save time when you next shop using the FREE± Asda App.  
Shopped in-store before? : Transfer your favourite items on your receipt into your online basket. Clever!
Find your nearest store: By turning on-location services, you can locate your nearest store wherever you are.  
 
With the ASDA groceries shopping app, you can: 
 
- Shop the full grocery range available in our stores 
- Book, amend or cancel your order while on the go 
- Quickly add favourites and Shopping List items to your trolley 
- Browse special offers and rollbacks 
- Find items using voice search or barcode scanner 
- Discover recipes; add ingredients straight to your trolley or Shopping List in one tap 
- Buy an ASDA Delivery Pass for savings on delivery charges 
- Find nearby ASDA stores; view store hours, and get directions.
- Let us know you’re on your way. We’ll make sure your shopping is ready to collect when you arrive^

Here are the permissions the app needs, and what we use them for: 
- ‘Identity’ - used to securely save your login details to your phone 
- ‘Location’ - used to find store locations 
- ‘Camera/Microphone’ - used only for the barcode scanner 
- ‘External storage access’ - used so the app can be saved to an SD card 
 
Want to get in touch? You can contact us by: 
Email - mobile@asda.co.uk 
Twitter - https://twitter.com/asda 
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/Asda 
Web - http://your.asda.com/contact-us   

 
CTA = Download now 
 
±Mobile data charges apply.


What’s New
At Asda we value your feedback and are constantly making improvements to the app.

This update includes:

• Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

title: ALDI UK
description:
Snap up incredible offers on our latest Specialbuys, from Kitchenware to Sports and DIY. Or why not create your own wine case of 6 bottles or more?

• Browse and buy our great-value Specialbuys on the go
• Create your own case of wine with 6 or more bottles from our award-winning range
• Order your favourite products simply and safely with a secure checkout process
• Choose from a great range of delivery options for Specialbuys and wines 
• Take a look at an exciting range of products before you buy online or in store
• Receive notifications when we add new Specialbuys or wines we know you’ll love
• Find your nearest Aldi with our handy store finder
• Share great products with your friends through our social media channels

title: Sainsbury's Groceries
description: You can now do your groceries shopping wherever and whenever it suits you with the Sainsbury’s Groceries app. That means 30,000+ products in your pocket ready to be delivered to your door at your chosen date and time. Here’s some of the things you can do with it: - Browse or search for food, drink, and household products - Create a new order or edit an existing one - Link your Nectar card and collect rewards points whilst you shop - Get all our best offers and deals - Use the app for food and drink deliveries all over the UK, or Click & Collect your shopping from one of our stores. Already a registered Sainsbury’s groceries shopper? In that case it’s easy, just log into the app with your usual details and you’ll find all your information, offers and Favourites there waiting for you. What if you’re new to shopping for groceries online? It only takes a moment to register and get shopping. Your most ordered items are automatically added to your Favourites, so the more you shop with the app, the quicker it gets. We’re always trying to improve our Groceries app, so each new release will contain a combination of new features, performance enhancements and bug fixes.
descriptionHTML:
You can now do your groceries shopping wherever and whenever it suits you with the Sainsbury’s Groceries app.

That means 30,000+ products in your pocket ready to be delivered to your door at your chosen date and time.

Here’s some of the things you can do with it:
- Browse or search for food, drink, and household products
- Create a new order or edit an existing one
- Link your Nectar card and collect rewards points whilst you shop
- Get all our best offers and deals
- Use the app for food and drink deliveries all over the UK, or Click & Collect your shopping from one of our stores.

Already a registered Sainsbury’s groceries shopper?
In that case it’s easy, just log into the app with your usual details and you’ll find all your information, offers and Favourites there waiting for you.

What if you’re new to shopping for groceries online?
It only takes a moment to register and get shopping. Your most ordered items are automatically added to your Favourites, so the more you shop with the app, the quicker it gets.

We’re always trying to improve our Groceries app, so each new release will contain a combination of new features, performance enhancements and bug fixes.
summary: Do your Sainsbury's shop on your phone and we’ll deliver to your doorstep.
summaryHTML: Do your Sainsbury's shop on your phone and we’ll deliver to your doorstep.

title: Waitrose & Partners
description:
New to Waitrose & Partners online? 
No problem. Create an account in our app and you can start shopping straight away. You can also sign up to myWaitrose or link to an existing account via the app.
 
Already shop online with Waitrose & Partners? 
Sign in using your waitrose.com details and you're good to go. With the app, you can book a delivery slot, view existing orders, amend orders and search for products with ease.

On the move? 
Start a shop in our app, and complete it at waitrose.com ‒ or vice versa. Your Trolley contents and account details will automatically sync.

Are you a myWaitrose member? 
Leave your physical myWaitrose card at home and still benefit from the same great offers. Scan the digital card in the app at checkout or use it to unlock Quick Check handsets. You can also add your myWaitrose card to your Google Pay wallet.
 
Click & Collect now on the app
Why wait in? Pop to your local Waitrose & Partners store and collect your order – free of charge.

Entertaining now on the app
If you’re feeding a crowd or planning  a special celebration, our made to order range will make stress-free celebrations simple yet stylish.

Use Favourites 
Easily find the items you regularly buy online and in-store. Any items you’ve previously bought online will be automatically added into your Favourites, and items you buy in-store using your myWaitrose card will also be listed. To add more items into your Favourites simply tap on the heart icons.
 
In a Waitrose & Partners store and see something you like? 
Use the app to find out more about it, view nutritional information, and read reviews to see how other customers rate its quality and value. Don’t want to buy it there and then? Add it to your Trolley in our app ready for your next delivery or collection.
 
Quick checkout 
Place your order and use fingerprint recognition to securely authenticate at checkout.

Home screen shortcuts 
Speedily access your myWaitrose card, trolley and offers directly from your device home screen – simply press and hold the app icon.

Add upcoming orders to your calendar 
After check out simply add your delivery or collection slot time to your phone’s calendar so you’ll never forget the date of your next order.

You may notice some features you use when shopping online at waitrose.com are not yet on the app (such as multi search and lists). We are working hard to bring these and more to the app. Watch this space…

To help us improve our app, we would really appreciate your feedback. We’ve added a place for you to send us comments on the home screen, so if you think something doesn’t work as well as it could, or have any other suggestions, please tell us what you think.

Visit www.waitrose.com for more information.

https://www.facebook.com/waitroseandpartners
https://twitter.com/waitrose
https://www.pinterest.co.uk/waitroseandpartners
https://www.youtube.com/user/Waitrose
https://www.instagram.com/waitroseandpartners
